title: When you get honored for Tilt-Proof
body: But you're literally screaming at your computer screen and having a seizure in your chair

replies.body:
I know that feel man. People often think I am calm lol

https://i.giphy.com/media/Pi6Nc1HObb96g/giphy.gif

aaAaAaaaAAaAaAAaaAAaAAAAAAaaAAaAAAaaaaaaAAAaaaA
my therapist doesn't accept me for who i am
Years of supporting.
I wonder what seemingly calm people would look like when they're tilting...

> I wonder what seemingly calm people would look like when they're tilting...

https://media.tenor.com/images/d6c20693799e7373cd1f608eb3e2db47/tenor.gif
https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=vzN3qO-qc8U
I KNEW IT. Fish really ARE taking over lol. (IM ON TO YOU...){{champion:83}}
The feels.
http://imgur.com/53Z3EYf.jpg?nodirect
https://media.licdn.com/mpr/mpr/AAEAAQAAAAAAAAjzAAAAJDJlMGQ1OWEzLWIxMDItNGRkZi04ODNjLWFkZDE1NzNiYzg4NQ.png
If you were the only one who did not try to sabotage the team with negativity, I'm going to honor you. It's indicative of more mental stability than a lot of people seem to have in my ranked games.
Or maybe just a broken ENTER key.
Or they're chat restricted.

Oh, you can still type a message or 2 of evil when chat restricted. You get limited messages and negative ones mean you don't get any more for that game and maybe get banned if bad enough. But damn will people go out of their way to try to tilt you if you are restricted. Intentionally camp your lane, flash masteries at you all game long, 3 man you when the still can't win lane 2v1, teammates go out of their way to flame you more than you ever said to anyone to get yourself chat restricted, they refuse to gank or help - rather watch you burn and lose game than help, harass you in every way possible to get you to tilt and flame. Such is life when chat restricted. Still get that treatment some games and it is so hard not to reply in kind.

U FILTHY BASTARD. How DARE you have the b=nerve to type such a well thought-out and compelling comment that I wasted 2 mins of my life trying to type in my password correctly to upvote u, only to realize that I didn't click the DAMN TEXT BOX.

oh.. now I feel bad for upvoting bc u r in EU. (patriotism and stuff)

Yeah, nobody can hear you screaming on the other end.
https://gifs.com/gif/tilt-proof-vgEMj8

On the side note, nobody knows your actually a cat facerolling on the keyboard.

My first experience w/ the new honor system.. Enemy team had a rager who was flaming all game.. They all vote to give him honor for chill/tilt proof.. They thought it was the funniest thing.

{{sticker:zombie-brand-facepalm}}

Team all loses or worse feeds except 1 teammate who is on-par with lane opponent. You won lane 1v2 with no help. You politely repeatedly remind team to use their FREE trinket wards, to just group 4 and hold towers or push enemy towers when they can, and to stay close to baron and dragon when possible to contest them. Get flamed for being "toxic" all game, sacrifice yourself constantly to save them, catch them up, set them up for easy win-condition plays (like 4v2 baron force), and get flamed all game. You provide more vision than the rest of your team combined - and you aren't even the support. You risk your neck to set up winning teamfights - sometimes paying for it dearly and getting flamed for a "shit" or "noob" engage because your team is too chicken to follow up on forcing a 5v4 when the enemy has it's fed jg or adc halfways across the map with no tp. By the time they commit, the enemy is grouped as 5. And post-game even though you carried your sub-par or feeding teammates to victory all game long, you get 0 honors - because "toxic". Gosh, sorry I ask you guys to stop splitting off, group up and do your damn job as a 4 man unit since every time you split, you get picked off or baited into bad fights. Sorry I ask you to ward the map so we can see where the enemy is. I didn't realize that was so toxic of me to do. And this is why I hate the honor system - because you get people like that on your team the majority of games and even though only 2 people on your team deserve honor (you and the one other teammate who stopped tilting because you marshalled the troops and got them doing smart plays instead of running around like headless chickens) neither one of you gets 3 honors - you don't even get 1 honor.

I got honored once for being Tilt-Proof, and I wasn't even tilted!
So here you go, have a free upvote.
http://4.bp.blogspot.com/-3PZhBqkbF6U/UExreutG4cI/AAAAAAAACu4/iIiTVLroxNA/s1600/patrick-bateman-upvote.jpg
https://cdn.meme.am/images/600x600/14447260/veins-popping.jpg
https://image.slidesharecdn.com/imuk14final-140707114028-phpapp02/95/in-digital-space-no-one-can-hear-you-scream-41-638.jpg?cb=1429849880
That moment when the guy who singlehandedly carried the game while wishing death and cancer to everyone gets 3 honors for tilt proof while i report him for flame xd
Luckily, honours have no impact on a flame report - or so we're told.
when I get tripled honored for being tilt proof as I rage at my team intent feeding as I go being so done with their shit
that was literally my last game against this terd twitch jg
boi. me rn. I feel you fam.

200 upvotes.

http://img02.deviantart.net/2f4e/i/2016/038/f/7/jhin_meme_by_mikouchan-d9qyb6a.png
My chair's arm rest can confirm that I am guilty.

I have a keyboard that says "aye!".
_Need for Speed: Underground, back in 2003...completed in 1 week and 1 keyboard._

Reminds of a poor sod I knew at the local LAN party - he always brought 2-3 keyboards with him to "vent"...except the one time he brought a laptop.

I was playing with a friend and was semi-flaming (more just being a sarcastic ass like usual) this trio we got matched with for pretty much the whole game until we lost. Next game we got matched with the *same* trio and I basically complained the whole time just to keep the thing going.

First game all 3 gave me tilt-proof

Second game all 3 gave me friendly/fun to play with

:3
Once, I angrily screamed at league, and my friends on discord actually had to ask if i was okay. I got tilt-proof.

I get honored for everything except tilt-proof. 
I'm in a Discord, unfortunately.
They can hear my unearthly screeching.
http://i0.kym-cdn.com/photos/images/original/001/207/161/492.jpg

I think that as long as you vent your anger out in a healthy way without ruining your team's experience (like punching your pillow) it's 100% fine. That's how I learned to cope with the frustration that League can dish out sometimes.

Went a whole game as splitpush yorick against a jax and my only wordsds in chat were: "go ez on me " "gank plz" once to the xin sup and "sorry" to the syndra fter she died in a teamfight nd typed "guys I need protection" and I had failed to land my e on the right target. (hit jax who just used e instead of the fiddle using ult. everyone honored me and called me a shotcaller and I got REALLY confused. 
my point has nothing to do with this thread and it's that my man darkk mane was RIGHT.) 99% of lol player are genically enhanced supersoldier fish in area 51 playing lol to increase their tolerance to toxic environments like a nuclear warzone. there is no other explanation for why they would honor a shoddy bronzie like myself.
Carried the game with zed 16 - 1 got four tiltproof feelsbadmen
I avoid talking in chat because I know I will get banned that is why there is the wall behind me which has about 43 holes in it now and the count is still growing daily. T I L T P R O O F.

I had a match yesterday where one of my teammate was an inter who started their death spree at mid lane after we accidentally fed 3 kills right at the start of the game.

So I was kinda having a somewhat (or "rather") angry blast in the chatlogs at that.

And then once it was finally over (we lost obviously), I noticed someone actually honoured me for tilt-proof. Not sure if someone misclicked or was trolling me, though I'd like to think maybe I wasn't so mad as I'd thought I was hehehehehehehehehehehe~

Maybe the others just raged more? Or you stopped your angry chat and they thought wow - how mature to let it go. Or they thought everyone was trash that game and you did less badly than everyone else but couldn't be honored for shotcalling or friendly.

This is why I don't get a headset and use voice coms. I'm trying to do everyone in the game a favor. Cuz I can be positive and helpful; it's what I try to be, but when people ignore, int, and flame without cause or helpful info included in their rants, I eventually tilt very hard and speak with less politeness.
This normally happens when I mute my team because they flame at me for falling behind

Happens to me all the time, I got honored for tilt proof, and if you would see me irl i was raging, some of my friends said that it was obvious that i was frustrated and tilted, but that i wasn't hurting anyone so might be that, or it might be that Im that good at hiding it.
Didn't upvote to keep it at 111
And then we get voice chat.
so true it hurtz
